reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress cute for cooler weather, with a perfect knee-length fit and well-made construction. The dress is soft and comfortable, with one customer noting it's great for wearing with boots. The material quality receives positive feedback, with customers describing it as solid and smooth. While some it's true to size, others find it too short, and the material thickness receives mixed reviews with several noting it's thin. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very pretty
items.body: I just love this knit dress. The chocolate color is so rich looking. True to size. I am 5’4” and it hits just above the knee. I ordered the medium which I usually wear. I got so many complements on it at our photo shoot. It is well made. Read more
items.author: Paul T Currie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value!
items.body: I am 5’6” wear a size medium weigh 140 lbs and it fits perfectly. It comes just to my knee. This dress is comfortable, soft and warm. It is not very thick material but looks good with my boots. Great price and quality. Fabric is thick enough to not see through and I LOVE that it has pockets!great little knock around dress! Read more
items.author: Angie C

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice dress
items.body: Super cute dress. Comfortable, thin material. Good for the south as it gets chilly. Read more
items.author: Michelle C Rivera

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this dress!
items.body: This dress is so cute and stylish. I am 5’4 and ordered a medium. It falls about knee length and flows nicely without feeling clingy. I wore this with tall boots and it looked really cute. I received several compliments regarding the style and elegance of the sleeves. Read more
items.author: Melissa Tobin

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Sleeves are too short
items.body: It is cute, but the sleeves are too short and make it awkward and uncomfortable to wear. The dress fits overall, so it’s not that I ordered the wrong size. Read more
items.author: Tiffany

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Holiday Cheers!
items.body: This was a great dress for my company holiday lunch. Soft, comfortable, breathable material that is flattering with pockets. Read more
items.author: Misty Emey

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nic winter dress.
items.body: Fit is as expected; Fabric on the thin side, but otherwise fine. Color true to picture. Read more
items.author: Rebecca Doran

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty dress for Fall
items.body: I love the shade of green! Perfect for Fall. The fabric isn’t as soft as I like, but it’s very comfortable. True to size. Even the sleeves are long enough. Read more
items.author: Customer

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.
about_this_item:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.
long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Light Brown, Brown, Deep Green, A-black, Blue, Deep Red, Mid Grey, Burgundy, Burnt Orange, Dark Grey, Army Green, Coffee, Navy Blue, Khaki. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
